hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Fire Temple Compass#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of time.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Spirit Temple Compass# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Zora Scale#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest
